mapper.insert: insert into GRAIN_PROJECTSPROGRESS (ID, ENTERPRISENAME, PROJECTNAME, PROJECTNUMBER, PLANSTARTTIME, PLANENDTIME, SCALEANDCONTENT, WAREHOUSECOUNT, STORAGEROOMCOUNT, TOTALPROJECTINVESTMENT, CENTRALPAY, AREAPAY, LOANPAY, FOREIGNPAY, OTHERPAY, INPLACEPAY, INPLACECENTRALPAY, INPLACEAREAPAY, INPLACELOANPAY, INPLACEFOREIGNPAY, INPLACEOTHERPAY, ALREADYSTARTEDNUMBER, APPROVEDPROJECTNUMBER, UNDERWAYPROJECTNUMBER, ACCUMULATIVETOTALINVESTMENT, INVESTMENTCOMPLETED, PROJECTCAPACITY, ISSUES, REMARKS, REPORTINGTIME, REPORTINGUNIT, COUNTTIME, REPORTPEOPLE, TEL ) values (#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{enterprisename,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{projectname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{projectnumber,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{planstarttime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{planendtime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{scaleandcontent,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{warehousecount,jdbcType=FLOAT}, #{storageroomcount,jdbcType=FLOAT}, #{totalprojectinvestment,jdbcType=FLOAT}, #{centralpay,jdbcType=FLOAT}, #{areapay,jdbcType=FLOAT}, #{loanpay,jdbcType=FLOAT}, #{foreignpay,jdbcType=FLOAT}, #{otherpay,jdbcType=FLOAT}, #{inplacepay,jdbcType=FLOAT}, #{inplacecentralpay,jdbcType=FLOAT}, #{inplaceareapay,jdbcType=FLOAT}, #{inplaceloanpay,jdbcType=FLOAT}, #{inplaceforeignpay,jdbcType=FLOAT}, #{inplaceotherpay,jdbcType=FLOAT}, #{alreadystartednumber,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{approvedprojectnumber,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{underwayprojectnumber,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{accumulativetotalinvestment,jdbcType=FLOAT}, #{investmentcompleted,jdbcType=FLOAT}, #{projectcapacity,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{issues,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{reportingtime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{reportingunit,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{counttime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{reportpeople,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tel,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
mapper.update: update GRAIN_PROJECTSPROGRESS set ENTERPRISENAME = #{enterprisename,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PROJECTNAME = #{projectname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PROJECTNUMBER = #{projectnumber,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, PLANSTARTTIME = #{planstarttime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PLANENDTIME = #{planendtime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SCALEANDCONTENT = #{scaleandcontent,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, WAREHOUSECOUNT = #{warehousecount,jdbcType=FLOAT}, STORAGEROOMCOUNT = #{storageroomcount,jdbcType=FLOAT}, TOTALPROJECTINVESTMENT = #{totalprojectinvestment,jdbcType=FLOAT}, CENTRALPAY = #{centralpay,jdbcType=FLOAT}, AREAPAY = #{areapay,jdbcType=FLOAT}, LOANPAY = #{loanpay,jdbcType=FLOAT}, FOREIGNPAY = #{foreignpay,jdbcType=FLOAT}, OTHERPAY = #{otherpay,jdbcType=FLOAT}, INPLACEPAY = #{inplacepay,jdbcType=FLOAT}, INPLACECENTRALPAY = #{inplacecentralpay,jdbcType=FLOAT}, INPLACEAREAPAY = #{inplaceareapay,jdbcType=FLOAT}, INPLACELOANPAY = #{inplaceloanpay,jdbcType=FLOAT}, INPLACEFOREIGNPAY = #{inplaceforeignpay,jdbcType=FLOAT}, INPLACEOTHERPAY = #{inplaceotherpay,jdbcType=FLOAT}, ALREADYSTARTEDNUMBER = #{alreadystartednumber,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, APPROVEDPROJECTNUMBER = #{approvedprojectnumber,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, UNDERWAYPROJECTNUMBER = #{underwayprojectnumber,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, ACCUMULATIVETOTALINVESTMENT = #{accumulativetotalinvestment,jdbcType=FLOAT}, INVESTMENTCOMPLETED = #{investmentcompleted,jdbcType=FLOAT}, PROJECTCAPACITY = #{projectcapacity,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ISSUES = #{issues,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, REMARKS = #{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, REPORTINGTIME = #{reportingtime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, REPORTINGUNIT = #{reportingunit,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, COUNTTIME = #{counttime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, REPORTPEOPLE = #{reportpeople,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TEL = #{tel,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select ID, ENTERPRISENAME, PROJECTNAME, PROJECTNUMBER, PLANSTARTTIME, PLANENDTIME, SCALEANDCONTENT, WAREHOUSECOUNT, STORAGEROOMCOUNT, TOTALPROJECTINVESTMENT, CENTRALPAY, AREAPAY, LOANPAY, FOREIGNPAY, OTHERPAY, INPLACEPAY, INPLACECENTRALPAY, INPLACEAREAPAY, INPLACELOANPAY, INPLACEFOREIGNPAY, INPLACEOTHERPAY, ALREADYSTARTEDNUMBER, APPROVEDPROJECTNUMBER, UNDERWAYPROJECTNUMBER, ACCUMULATIVETOTALINVESTMENT, INVESTMENTCOMPLETED, PROJECTCAPACITY, ISSUES, REMARKS, REPORTINGTIME, REPORTINGUNIT, COUNTTIME, REPORTPEOPLE, TEL from GRAIN_PROJECTSPROGRESS where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select ID, ENTERPRISENAME, PROJECTNAME, PROJECTNUMBER, PLANSTARTTIME, PLANENDTIME, SCALEANDCONTENT, WAREHOUSECOUNT, STORAGEROOMCOUNT, TOTALPROJECTINVESTMENT, CENTRALPAY, AREAPAY, LOANPAY, FOREIGNPAY, OTHERPAY, INPLACEPAY, INPLACECENTRALPAY, INPLACEAREAPAY, INPLACELOANPAY, INPLACEFOREIGNPAY, INPLACEOTHERPAY, ALREADYSTARTEDNUMBER, APPROVEDPROJECTNUMBER, UNDERWAYPROJECTNUMBER, ACCUMULATIVETOTALINVESTMENT, INVESTMENTCOMPLETED, PROJECTCAPACITY, ISSUES, REMARKS, REPORTINGTIME, REPORTINGUNIT, COUNTTIME, REPORTPEOPLE, TEL from GRAIN_PROJECTSPROGRESS where 1=1 ${_parameter}
